text: Harigi buna mueŋ khaŋ muuŋgi. Gu khueŋ vuzvugi, guigira Zisas khothɨgi mbigi, mbe fhura ferfera rui mbigi wari nzɨɨ sɨɨn muuŋ thari. Mbe fhura ferferɨp, sɨɨŋ mbatɨgar warir muuŋv mbarkɨrga sɨɨn muuŋv, wari won pani sɨɨŋv, ŋkɨɨa vun ndagi shagi gu bigi sharɨv, gorar muuŋgi bigi wari sɨɨŋ thari.
